links.title: LIONSGATE AND LIONSGATE STUDIOS REPORT RESULTS FOR SECOND QUARTER FISCAL 2025
LIONSGATE AND LIONSGATE STUDIOS TO RELEASE SECOND QUARTER EARNINGS FOR FISCAL 2025 AND HOLD ANALYST AND INVESTOR CONFERENCE CALL AFTER MARKET CLOSE ON THURSDAY, NOVEMBER 7, 2024
links.content:
[Skip to content](#lfg-main-content)

![](/sites/g/files/knoqqb92101/themes/site/client_site/dist/images/LG_clouds.jpg)

# Release Details

## 

LIONSGATE AND LIONSGATE STUDIOS TO RELEASE SECOND QUARTER EARNINGS FOR FISCAL 2025 AND HOLD ANALYST AND INVESTOR CONFERENCE CALL AFTER MARKET CLOSE ON THURSDAY, NOVEMBER 7, 2024

October 17, 2024

[PDF Version](/node/7116/pdf)

SANTA MONICA, Calif., and VANCOUVER, BC, Oct. 17, 2024 /PRNewswire/ -- Lionsgate (NYSE: [LGF.A](https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/lionsgate-and-lionsgate-studios-to-release-second-quarter-earnings-for-fiscal-2025-and-hold-analyst-and-investor-conference-call-after-market-close-on-thursday-november-7-2024-302279233.html#financial-modal)) (NYSE: [LGF.B](https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/lionsgate-and-lionsgate-studios-to-release-second-quarter-earnings-for-fiscal-2025-and-hold-analyst-and-investor-conference-call-after-market-close-on-thursday-november-7-2024-302279233.html#financial-modal)) and Lionsgate Studios (Nasdaq: [LION](https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/lionsgate-and-lionsgate-studios-to-release-second-quarter-earnings-for-fiscal-2025-and-hold-analyst-and-investor-conference-call-after-market-close-on-thursday-november-7-2024-302279233.html#financial-modal)) today announced they will release their financial results for the fiscal 2025 second quarter ended September 30, 2024 after market close on Thursday, November 7.

Lionsgate and Lionsgate Studios senior management will hold their analyst and investor call to discuss their fiscal 2025 second quarter at 5:00 P.M. ET/2:00 P.M. PT on Thursday, November 7. Interested parties may listen to the live webcast by visiting the events pages on the Lionsgate Investor Relations [website](https://c212.net/c/link/?t=0&l=en&o=4280467-1&h=2393215398&u=https%3A%2F%2Furl.us.m.mimecastprotect.com%2Fs%2FbNQfCM89VXCYvLJrhwfwF8u_gX%3Fdomain%3Dinvestors.lionsgate.com&a=website), the Lionsgate Studios Investor Relations [website](https://c212.net/c/link/?t=0&l=en&o=4280467-1&h=2897783224&u=https%3A%2F%2Furl.us.m.mimecastprotect.com%2Fs%2FqCS1CNk86GSpwQ6WU4hXFyGEpK%3Fdomain%3Dinvestors.lionsgatestudios.com&a=website) or via the following [link](https://c212.net/c/link/?t=0&l=en&o=4280467-1&h=2991955300&u=https%3A%2F%2Furl.us.m.mimecastprotect.com%2Fs%2FGOB7COYZ0GskEgO8skiYFGAZE3%3Fdomain%3Devent.choruscall.com&a=link). A full replay will be available starting Thursday evening, November 7, by clicking the same link. The financial results of both Lionsgate and Lionsgate Studios will be presented and discussed on the same call.

**_About Lionsgate Studios_** Lionsgate Studios (Nasdaq: [LION](https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/lionsgate-and-lionsgate-studios-to-release-second-quarter-earnings-for-fiscal-2025-and-hold-analyst-and-investor-conference-call-after-market-close-on-thursday-november-7-2024-302279233.html#financial-modal)) is one of the world's leading standalone, pure play, publicly-traded content companies. It brings together diversified motion picture and television production and distribution businesses, a world-class portfolio of valuable brands and franchises, a talent management and production powerhouse and a more than 20,000-title film and television library, all driven by Lionsgate's bold and entrepreneurial culture. 

** _About Lionsgate_** Lionsgate (NYSE: [LGF.A](https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/lionsgate-and-lionsgate-studios-to-release-second-quarter-earnings-for-fiscal-2025-and-hold-analyst-and-investor-conference-call-after-market-close-on-thursday-november-7-2024-302279233.html#financial-modal), LGF.B) owns approximately 87% of the outstanding shares of Lionsgate Studios Corp. (Nasdaq: [LION](https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/lionsgate-and-lionsgate-studios-to-release-second-quarter-earnings-for-fiscal-2025-and-hold-analyst-and-investor-conference-call-after-market-close-on-thursday-november-7-2024-302279233.html#financial-modal)), one of the world's leading standalone, pure play, publicly-traded content companies, as well as the premium subscription platform STARZ.

For investor inquiries, please contact:

Nilay Shahnshah@lionsgate.com 310-255-3651

For media inquiries, please contact:

Laurel Pecchia lpecchia@lionsgate.com 310-255-5114

SOURCE LIONSGATE

links.title: Runway Partners with Lionsgate in First-of-its-Kind AI Collaboration
links.content:
[Skip to content](#lfg-main-content)

NASDAQ GS: LION $7.23 0 (0.00%)

![](/sites/g/files/knoqqb92101/themes/site/client_site/dist/images/LG_clouds.jpg)

# Release Details

## 

Runway Partners with Lionsgate in First-of-its-Kind AI Collaboration

September 18, 2024

[PDF Version](/node/7091/pdf)

SANTA MONICA, Calif. & NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Sep. 18, 2024-- Global content leader Lionsgate (NYSE: LGF.A, LGF.B) and leading applied AI research company Runway today announced a first-of-its-kind partnership centered around Runway’s creation and training of a new AI model, customized to Lionsgate’s proprietary portfolio of film and television content. Exclusively designed to help Lionsgate Studios, its filmmakers, directors and other creative talent augment their work, the model generates cinematic video that can be further iterated using Runway’s suite of controllable tools. The partnership is the first collaboration between Runway and a Hollywood studio.

This press release features multimedia. View the full release here: <https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20240918322724/en/>

“Runway is a visionary, best-in-class partner who will help us utilize AI to develop cutting-edge, capital-efficient content creation opportunities,” said Lionsgate Vice Chair Michael Burns. “Several of our filmmakers are already excited about its potential applications to their pre-production and post-production process. We view AI as a great tool for augmenting, enhancing and supplementing our current operations.”

“We’re committed to giving artists, creators and studios the best and most powerful tools to augment their workflows and enable new ways of bringing their stories to life. The history of art is the history of technology and these new models are part of our continuous efforts to build transformative mediums for artistic and creative expression. The best stories are yet to be told,” said Runway co-founder and CEO Cristóbal Valenzuela. “Lionsgate has an incredible creative team and a clear vision for how AI can help their work – we’re excited to help bring their ideas to life.”

**About Lionsgate Studios**

Lionsgate Studios (Nasdaq: LION) is one of the world's leading standalone, pure play, publicly-traded content companies. It brings together diversified motion picture and television production and distribution businesses, a world-class portfolio of valuable brands and franchises, a talent management and production powerhouse and a more than 20,000-title film and television library, all driven by Lionsgate's bold and entrepreneurial culture.

**About Lionsgate**

Lionsgate (NYSE: LGF.A, LGF.B) owns approximately 87% of the outstanding shares of Lionsgate Studios Corp. (Nasdaq: LION), one of the world’s leading standalone, pure play, publicly-traded content companies, as well as the premium subscription platform STARZ.

**About Runway**

Runway is an applied AI research company shaping the next era of art, entertainment and human creativity. The company conducts research in multi-modal AI systems, builds infrastructure to safely deploy models, and invents products and applications that leverage new techniques for multimedia content. To learn more visit [runwayml.com/research](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=http%3A%2F%2Frunwayml.com%2Fresearch&esheet=54123628&newsitemid=20240918322724&lan=en-US&anchor=runwayml.com%2Fresearch&index=1&md5=da6c09a88aa13034f954a195c0ca36f7) and [www.runwayml.com](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.runwayml.com&esheet=54123628&newsitemid=20240918322724&lan=en-US&anchor=www.runwayml.com&index=2&md5=f2e4be1e094281f4c1593648ff4be384).

![](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=bwnews&sty=20240918322724r1&sid=acqr8&distro=nx&lang=en)

View source version on [businesswire.com](http://businesswire.com): <https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20240918322724/en/>

For media inquiries: Peter D. Wilkes Lionsgate 310-255-3726 pwilkes@lionsgate.com

Cole Garry Runway runway@sbscomms.com

Source: Runway
